select task.ID_ as task_id,fm.id as business_key,fm.proc_inst_id,fm.proc_def_id, fm.serial_no,fm.title,d.name as merchant_name,cu.nickname as start_user_name,fm.submit_time, task.CREATE_TIME_ as arrival_time, task.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee_user_id, u.nickname as assignee_user_name from bpm_form_main fm inner join act_ru_task task on fm.proc_inst_id = task.PROC_INST_ID_ left join system_dept d on fm.merchant_id = d.id left join system_users u on task.ASSIGNEE_ = u.id left join system_users cu on fm.start_user_id = cu.id where fm.status = 1 and task.ASSIGNEE_ = #{loginUserId}
and cu.nickname like concat('%', #{todoReqVO.startUserName}, '%')
and DATE_FORMAT(fm.submit_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{todoReqVO.applyDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and fm.title like concat('%', #{todoReqVO.title}, '%')
and d.name like concat('%', #{todoReqVO.merchantName}, '%')
and fm.serial_no like concat('%', #{todoReqVO.serialNo}, '%')
ORDER BY task.CREATE_TIME_ desc
